revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Lush Jungle |image = [[File:Lush Jungle.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Lush Jungle. |tokens = 925,000 |location = North of Route 5. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Lush Jungle''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. The [[Gyms#Alola|Grassium-Z]] [[File:GrassiumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 13,090,332 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod || rowspan=13 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras |- | [[File:Pinsir.png|40px]] Pinsir |- | [[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot |- | [[File:Bonsly.png|40px]] Bonsly |- | [[File:Trumbeak.png|40px]] Trumbeak |- | [[File:Fomantis.png|40px]] Fomantis |- | [[File:Bounsweet.png|40px]] Bounsweet |- | [[File:Steenee.png|40px]] Steenee |- | [[File:Comfey.png|40px]] Comfey |- | [[File:Oranguru.png|40px]] Oranguru |- | [[File:Passimian.png|40px]] Passimian |- | [[File:Xurkitree.png|40px]] '''Xurkitree*''' |}
